fr.sorbonne_u.components.helpers

Class ComponentExecutorServiceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.helpers.ComponentExecutorServiceManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComponentSchedulableExecutorServiceManager

    public class ComponentExecutorServiceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The class ComponentExecutorServiceManager defines objects used to manage user-defined executor services in components.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2019-01-07

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService es
      executor service to run requests and tasks.
      protected int nbThreads
      number of threads in the executor service.
      protected java.lang.String uri
      unique identifier of the executor service within the component.

      • ComponentExecutorServiceManager

        public ComponentExecutorServiceManager(java.lang.String uri,
                                       int nbThreads)
        create a manager with the given URI and the given number of threads.

        Contract

         pre    uri != null
 pre    nbThreads > 0
 post   this.executorServiceCreated()
        Parameters:
        uri - unique identifier of the executor service within the component.
        nbThreads - number of threads in the executor service.

      • awaitTermination

        public boolean awaitTermination(long timeout,
                                java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
                         throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        await the termination of the executor service.

        Contract

         pre    timeout >= 0
 preaunit != null
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        timeout - maximum time to wait for the termination.
        unit - time unit to interpret the time out value.
        Returns:
        true if this executor terminated and false if the timeout elapsed before termination.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted while waiting.
